attributes.action: ban the production and sale of 'Bratz' dolls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
they are so vile and inappropriate. they are aimed at and are mainly bought by or for young girls. the dolls portray young girls as seductive and sexy. there are also bratz 'Babyz', dolls with the bodies of babies but wearing adult clothing, make up, jewellery, pouting porn star lips and piled up glamourous hair styles.
the dolls send the message to young girls, and boys, and to adults, that children are sexual beings and should aspire to look like these dolls. the dolls perpetuate the growing belief in children that they must be conventionally 'sexy' to be happy and accepted. the dolls ar peadophillic.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
